docblock.description: Activity base class
Base class for Moodle activities.
docblock.long-description: With the base functions that a class will need.

tag.name: var
tag.description: the activity's id used int eh moodle database in in most links to the activity.

tag.name: var
tag.description: the value for the id attribute for the link in the course

tag.name: var
tag.description: containing all variables for the session, page, log helper and content helper.

docblock.description: Consturctor for the class

tag.name: param
tag.description: mixed And array of variables that will be set for the activity. Must include the Container c variable to work. Array should be array('variable name'=> $value).

docblock.description: Create the activity by filling out the activity create form.
Grade the activity.
docblock.long-description: This should be overridden by the activity.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The grade the student should receive

docblock.description: Interact with the activity, usually view and post.
docblock.long-description: THis should be overridden by the activity unless all that the activity needs is to be viewed.

docblock.description: View the activity and create content.
docblock.long-description: This should be overridden by the activity unless all it needs to do is be viewed.

docblock.description: View the activity.
Mark the activity as completed or not completed by clicking on the activity completion icon if it exists.
Access the activity based on the location that is being requested.
docblock.long-description: Locations are the course or the navigation bar.

docblock.description: Add values to the general fields in the create activity form.
Add values to the required field for the activity.
docblock.long-description: This is not used if the activity has no required fields.

docblock.description: Locate the activity link in the navigation bar.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Return the link object or false if the link can't be found.

docblock.description: Locate the link to the activity in the course.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Return the link object or false if the link doesn't exist on the page.

docblock.description: Set the activity's id.
Return the current id for the activity
Set the CSS id for the link to the activity in the course.
Returns the CSS id for the link to the activity in the course.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The id attribute for the course link to the activity

docblock.description: Set the title of the activity

tag.name: param
tag.description: The title of the activity to be set.

docblock.description: Return the title of the activity
Activity base class
Moodle 2.3 assignment activity.
Post to an activity based on what is supported on the page, online submission and file submission supported only.
Assignment for Moodle 2.2 class
Assignment for Moodle 2.2 class
Post to the activity.
docblock.long-description:
Perform the following:

  • Find the correct activity type by the button that is dislayed
  • Post content or upload a file
  • Send for marking if that is enabled

docblock.description: Post online text

tag.name: param
tag.description: the \Behat\Mink\NodeElement for the button to click

docblock.description: Upload a file to an advanced file type

tag.name: param
tag.description: the \Behat\Mink\NodeElement for the button to click

docblock.description: This function is used to grade all users assignments in a course.
docblock.long-description: This doesn't check if a user actually submitted an assignment before grading the assignment.

tag.name: todo
tag.description: Make this work correctly with Mink

tag.name: param
tag.description: The cmid of the assignment to have the discussion created in.

parse_markers.notice: Parameter $activity could not be found in grade()

docblock.description: Book activity class
Book activity class
View the book and click the next link until there are no more next links.
docblock.long-description: This will page through chapters.

docblock.description: Choice activity class
Choice activity class
View the choice activity and then randomly select a choice
Add content to the 5 choice fields that are required fields.
Feedback activity class
Feedback activity class overrides just post function.
Post to the feedback activity.
docblock.long-description:
Posting does the following:

  • Find all input fields questions and add a random sentence in response
  • Find all text areas questions and add a random paragrah of text
  • Find all multiple choice questions and randomly select a choice

docblock.description: Folder activity class
Folder activity class.
docblock.long-description: Extends the activity and does everything by default.

docblock.description: Add a file to the folder resource in the creation screen
Base forum activity class
Forum base activity.

Interact with the discussion means do the following:
  • 20% of the time create a discussion
  • View each discussion in the forum
  • 20% of the time reply to a random post
Used to create a discussion.
docblock.long-description: Creates a new discussion object and then executes the create function.

docblock.description: This function changes the current view format for advanced forums

tag.name: param
tag.description: The select label to change the forums view tos

docblock.description: Create a new discussion in the forum.
This method gets all forum discussions for a forum

tag.name: param
tag.description: should this page interact with the Moodle paging system.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array of \Auto\Discussion objects that are on the page or every page is paging is set to true.

docblock.description: Glossary activity class
Glossary activity class
View the gloassary and then create a new entry based on a random word.
Advanced forum or HSU forum activity class
Hsuforum activity class
Imscp activity class
Imscp activity class.
docblock.long-description: Extends the activity and does everything by default.

docblock.description: Add the imscp file to the imscp creation screen
Page activity class
Page activity class.
docblock.long-description: Extends the activity and does everything by default.

docblock.description: Add the required fields for the page activity type in the resource creation screen
Quiz activity class
Quiz activity class.

This function is used to attempt a Quiz An attempt performs the following:
  • Answers the question
  • 10% of the time flags the question
  • Clicks the next button
Get all question areas on the page and return the NodeElement for them in an array.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array of \Behat\Mink\Element objects for the questions on that page.

docblock.description: This function is used to finalize a quiz attempt.
docblock.long-description: Clicking on the submit and finish button and the modal.

docblock.description: This function is used to grade manually graded questions in a quiz.
Resource activity class
Resource activity class.
docblock.long-description: Extends the activity and does everything by default.

docblock.description: Add a file to the file resource in the creation screen
Scorm activity class
Scorm activity class.
docblock.long-description: Extends the activity and does everything by default.

docblock.description: Add the scorm file to the scorm creation screen
Survey activity class
Survey activity class.
docblock.long-description: Extends the activity and does everything by default.

docblock.description: Add the survey type required field to the survey creation screen.
Url activity class
Url activity class.
docblock.long-description: Extends the activity and does everything by default.

docblock.description: Add values to the required fields for the url resource type in the resource creation screen

docblock.description: Command command file
Setup other commands it is the base class for auto commands
Get the applicaiton name and then process any help documentation for the command replacing the place holders with the correct text

ConduitFromFileCommand converts a conduit file to a webservices request.
{@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}
Config command file
ConfigCommand configures the yaml file.
{@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}
Course command file
CourseCommand Use to create, update and delete courses via the user interface.
docblock.long-description: In order for create to work the Admin user must have the html editor set to use standard web form

docblock.description: {@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}

markers.todo: determine what to do here, send a conduit update or add content
Send conduit archive commend or manually backup the course in joule.
manually restore a course based on a file name

docblock.description: Create site command file
CreateSiteCommand creates a site with all the courses and user enrollments.
{@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}
Failure command file
FailureCommand Use to send an email to the process administrators if there has been a failure on a site.
{@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}
List sites command file
ListSitesCommand lists the sites in the site configuration file.
{@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}
Nightly data generation for sales command file
NightlyCommand executes the nightly sales processes to add data base don user interactions.
{@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}
Site setup for nightly data generation command file
SetupSiteCommand enrolls the users in the correct courses for the nightly sales process.
{@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}
Student command file
StudentCommand displays the help for a given command.
{@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}
Teacher command file
TeacherCommand which executes processes on the site or batch of sites as a teacher.

  • id (optional): used by grading functions
  • username: used to log the user in
  • password: used to log the user in

This method returns the courses the user is enrolled in that show either on the My Moodle or site course pages.
This method clicks on the Home link in the navigation breadcrumb.
This method determines which action to take based on the class of the LI tag for the activity based on the CMID passed.
docblock.long-description:
Behaviors are:

  • forum: create discussion
  • assignment: post to assignment
  • quiz: attempt quiz
  • resource: view resource

tag.name: param
tag.description: the cmid of the module that is being interacted with

tag.name: param
tag.description: the percentage of time an activity shoudl be intereacted with, 10% means 1 out of every 10 activities is veiwed.

tag.name: param
tag.description: an array with the minimum and maximum grade a user should get. User to cacluate how often the user is correct or a teacher grades them at.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Return if the activity was interacted iwht or not.

tag.description: an array of activity objects to be marked

tag.description: a number of activities tobe complete, should be less than the number of activities.
